1370: Havix moved to Lievevrouwe kerch.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Hilduardis at age 29 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Hildegardis, at age 29.
1371: Had a son with Hilduardis, Meynolphus, at age 30.
1372: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Hadewigis, at age 31.
1373: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Hildegardis, at age 32.
1375: Had a son with Hilduardis, Lucas, at age 34.
1376: Had a daughter with Hilduardis, Erkenradis, at age 35.
1380: Had a son with Hilduardis, Frethericus, at age 39.
1381: Lost his wife Hilduardis while she was giving birth to Linnea in 1381.
Lost son Lucas when Lucas was 7 years old.
1382: Lost daughter Erkenradis when Erkenradis was 7 years old.
Lost son Frethericus when Frethericus was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
